Business news

Warehouse property
New Wildberries Warehouse in Petersburg will open for 2-3 weeks
Online ReteilerWildberriesA new logistics centre in Petersburg will be launched to replace the burnt for 2-3 weeks.
14:26, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Goods
Transport of ports and goods by rail in Latvia declined sharply
In Latvia, in 2023, freight traffic on the railway fell by 27.6 per cent, while port traffic fell by 19.6 per cent.
13:52, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Prices
FAS initiated a case against the Arkhangel CBK due to carton and paper prices
Federal Antimonopoly Service(FAS) filed a case againstArkhangel CBKBecause of the increase in the prices of potatoes and paper required for the production of gofrocartone.
12:28, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Car sales
Traffickers in Petersburg increased by 48% after 2023
In 2023, 60,928 new light and light commercial vehicles were registered in Petersburg, an increase of 48 per cent over the previous year.
12:11, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Income
Protective elements: Workshop added conservative tools to the portfolio
It only allocated 5.5% of the portfolio to these instruments. But in the amount of other bonds purchased earlier, protective papers now account for more than 14 per cent.
09:50, 22 January 2024♪
Alexander Pyrochav
Road
Almost a fifth of the motorway runs in Petersburg are sold with a scrubbed counter.
About a third of the cars used are for sale with a broken run. This was reported by the representatives of the Izvestians.
09:16, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Metro
Mysterious sub-grounds: to the Petersburg elections, the subway construction accelerated
In 2024, three new subway stations could be opened in Petersburg, following a statement by Vice-Gubert Nikolai Linchenko at a press conference on Friday, 19 January. "In 2024, we will launch the Graduate Institute, finish the construction of South-West and Putilovsky," said the official. Truth is, the completion of construction does not mean opening, but there is still a chance, especially since sometimes the city starts work even officially unopened.
09:03, 22 January 2024♪
Alexander Lobanowski
Inflation
Inflation in Russia has begun to slow down since the beginning of the year
Inflation in Russia slowed at the beginning of 2024 for two consecutive weeks. It's reported by the news.
08:58, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Labour market
In Petersburg, demand for no-experienced researchers increased, and salaries also increased.
Since the beginning of 2024, Petersburg ' s employers have become 3.4 times more likely to place job offers for applicants with little experience. The proposed wages increased by 16 per cent compared with the previous year.
08:53, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Finance
Fix Price returns to payments
The current week is not very rich in events that can influence the quotations of stocks. On 24 January 2024, preliminary data on business activity in the US industry for January will be available. According to specialists from the FG ' s analytical office, Finam, weak statistics are provoking oil and other commodity prices, which negatively affect the Russian equity market.
08:40, 22 January 2024♪
Alexander Pyrochav
Reteil
"Magnith" was targeting Dalinium. East
The acquisition of 33.01 per cent of the share in the charter capital "Sambury" and the granting of the option to buy the remaining shares for five years, Magnett, was agreed in October 2023. The first phase of the transaction is expected to close in the summer of 2024.
08:38, 22 January 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva
Judicial disputes
"Modul" billionaire Altshuller has succeeded in reducing the indecent almost 10 times.
The Moscow Arbitration Court examined the Atomenergosnab (Ekaterinburg) claim, proposing integrated engineering solutions for the construction, modernization and technical restructuring of industrial facilities, to the Modul Transport Logistics Company, which owns the company.Alexander Altshuller(No158)Rating billionaires -- 2023)
08:32, 22 January 2024♪
Dimitri Marakulin
Budget
Boundary: Smart stepped up with debtors
The measure of exposure to non-payers in the form of a publicly available debtor register (list) prior to the Petersburg budget was introduced in the summer of 2021. At that time, the authorities explained that a single framework would help the city to deactivate unscrupulous tenants of State property from tax exemptions. Disputes about the validity of listing companies and the effectiveness of this measure have not been diminished since then.
08:26, 22 January 2024♪
Eugenia Petrov
Shipping
The maritime carrier bought a share in a large manufacturer of electric vessels from Petersburg
The New Maritime Investment Company, since December 27, 2023, has 10 per cent of the Pheterburg OO Empire. Last year, she purchased from the former Deputy Minister of Transport of the Russian Federation, Viktor of the Olery ' s Paula Reis, a ship's bag of the Idel, with 1.3 billion roubles. The prospects for electricity in water are highly uncertain.
08:04, 22 January 2024♪
Lev Godovnik
Transport
Pulkovo airport wants to make a new entrance from south-west Petersburg.
Aeroport in the city line like Petersburg is convenient for passengers. But there's a problem with this neighborhood. In particular, the vast urban area (and the Pulkovo area of about 1,250 ha) has been excluded from the street network and the network has been destroyed.
07:52, 22 January 2024♪
Vadim Kuzmitz
Income
Life Savings: 24% of Rossians reported passive income
Every fourth resident of Russia has a source of passive income. That's what Sber Life Watch reports.
07:46, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Services
Petburns are offered to clean the car or the snow road for a thousand rubles.
The current cold and very snow winter provides the inhabitants of Petersburg with seasonal possibilities of jacking. Online Services for Private Masters ' Retrieval has shown an intensive increase in demand for services that are rarely ranked in the first ratings at normal times. In parallel, the offer is growing.
07:40, 22 January 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva
FACH
To give the RC in Komarovo, a sewer station will be built
The Vodocanal is finalizing the results of a competition for the design and exploration work for the construction of a sewerage pumping station to connect the Eparachial St. Petersburg Episcopal House on Vasiliev Street, 4 in Komaro village. The station is designed to provide approximately 240 m3 per day for economical waters.
07:27, 22 January 2024♪
Vadim Kuzmitz
Payroll
Competitive competition for employees has increased, and experts are waiting for salary increases.
Russian firms continue to lack staff, so in 2024 they will become even more competitive in the proposed salaries. Experts from the human resources industry and trade union representatives from the Commersantu said that.
07:19, 22 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Construction
Wildberries can re-establish a warehouse burned in Shushara in six months.
The planned work would fully restore logistics infrastructure in the region and reduce the burden on other warehouses and marshalling centres, explained to companies. So far, everything is at the initial stage of development. Whether the project would change in general or only in the area of fire safety, Wildberries did not.
07:12, 22 January 2024♪
Evgeny Ivanov

info.title: New Wildberries Warehouse in Petersburg will open for 2-3 weeks
info.short_text: Online-reteiler Wildberries will launch a new logistics centre in Petersburg in return for a 2-3-week burn.

info.title: Transport of ports and goods by rail in Latvia declined sharply
info.short_text: In Latvia, in 2023, freight traffic on the railway fell by 27.6 per cent, while port traffic fell by 19.6 per cent.

info.title: FAS initiated a case against the Arkhangel CBK due to carton and paper prices
info.short_text: The Federal Antimonopoly Service (FAS) has initiated a case against the Arkhangel CBK due to the increase in the prices of cartons and paper required for the production of gofrocartone.

info.title: Traffickers in Petersburg increased by 48% after 2023
info.short_text: In 2023, 60,928 new light and light commercial vehicles were registered in Petersburg, an increase of 48 per cent over the previous year.

info.title: Protective elements: Workshop added conservative tools to the portfolio
info.short_text: It only allocated 5.5% of the portfolio to these instruments. But in the amount of other bonds purchased earlier, protective papers now account for more than 14 per cent.

info.title: Almost a fifth of the motorway runs in Petersburg are sold with a scrubbed counter.
info.short_text: About a third of the cars used are for sale with a broken run. This was reported by the representatives of the Izvestians.

info.short_text: In 2024, three new subway stations could be opened in Petersburg, following a statement by Vice-Gubert Nikolai Linchenko at a press conference on Friday, 19 January. "In 2024, we will launch the Graduate Institute, finish the construction of South-West and Putilovsky," said the official. Truth is, the completion of construction does not mean opening, but there is still a chance, especially since sometimes the city starts work even officially unopened.

info.title: Inflation in Russia has begun to slow down since the beginning of the year
info.short_text: Inflation in Russia slowed at the beginning of 2024 for two consecutive weeks. It's reported by the news.

info.title: "Magnite's targeting the Far East.

info.title: "Modul" billionaire Altshuller has succeeded in reducing the indecent almost 10 times.
info.short_text: The Court of Arbitration of Moscow has examined the Atomenergosnab (Ekaterinburg) claim, proposing integrated engineering solutions for the construction, modernization and technical rebuilding of industrial facilities, the Modul Transport Logistics Company, which is owned by Alexander Altshuller (No. 158 at the Ratting of Billionaires of RS 2023).

info.short_text: The measure of exposure to non-payers in the form of a publicly available debtor register (list) prior to the Petersburg budget was introduced in the summer of 2021. At that time, the authorities explained that a single framework would help the city to deactivate unscrupulous tenants of State property from tax exemptions. Disputes about the validity of listing companies and the effectiveness of this measure have not been diminished since then.

Last year, she purchased from the former Deputy Minister of Transport of the Russian Federation, Viktor of the Olery ' s Paula Reis, a ship's bag of the Idel, with 1.3 billion roubles. The prospects for electricity in water are highly uncertain.

The station is designed to provide approximately 240 m3 per day for economical waters.
